body:
I think this involves gender bend selfcest and rape 

Double shadow running through the dark night" by Shion  (闇夜を駆ける二重影【単話】)- About a heroine who defeats and  kills an evil  villain but not before using a spell that turns her into a male and is about to be raped by the evil clone  of herself 


Witch Avatar's revenge by torikawa is about a male clone of the witch who is to be her helper gets sexually assaulted a lot and is mistreated that he had enough and gives her a taste of her own medicine  by raping her.

Futari onanie (ふたりおなにー) by reiha is about a boy who is always bullied by 3 girls gets help by a demoness from the mirror in a form of his female self in exchange to be raped by her.

Ideal toys (理想の玩具) by puritei is about an alchemist who divide each portions of his soul to create lolicon  homunculus  of himself so he can use them as his sex toys for pleasure
